Author: Cryptoon#3362
Content: Please see the comment below the Picture with information about DBX with links to the Whitepaper. DBX uses a Data Storage Side-Chain to support the main chain for more simultanous management of transactions. Projects as EOS are also reaching hundreds of thousands of transactions with the use of Side-Chains, however due to our DDPoS Consensus Mechanism that uses passive voting the DBXChain can manage transaction much faster and more efficient. DBX project started already in 2016, however we chose to not have any funding until first version of the Mainnet was done and first Dapp integrated earlier this year.

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: often I see people complaining that "Komodo lacks focus" or "Komodo is doing too many things at once"

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: well, if we werent doing all the different things, how would it be possible to create a single solutions that solves all the issues?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: massive tx/sec is certainly possible and easy if you neglect to work on security

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: massive security is possible if you dont care about performance

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: etc.

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: this is why on all the cutting edge area of crypto, KMD is having a proposed solution (happens to be mostly working for most cases)

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: what few people understand is that it all works together

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: and that is what comes from lacking focus
